Author: Gisela Torres
Summary: It shutdowns/starts ARM virtual machines by resource group in parallel. It has two parameters: the service name and the action you want to perform (shutdown (true) or start (false) your VMs).You have to create a Credential Asset with the name DefaultAzureCredential in order t
Title: Shutdown/Start ARM VMs by Resource group in parallel.
UserTags: Utility, Windows Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Automation
